楖字的基本解释

楖
jí
〔楖栗〕ａ．古书上说的一种树，可以做手杖；ｂ．借指手杖，如“病怜楖楖随身惯。”

楖
zhì
古同“栉”。

楖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》阻瑟切，入櫛，莊。］
同“櫛1”。
(1)梳篦的总称。
(2)梳头。
(3)治木之工。
[②]［jí］
［《廣韻》資悉切，入質，精。］
见“楖2栗”。

楖字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楖； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页539第16
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?同楖。　又【周禮·冬官考工記】刮磨之工五：玉人、楖人、雕人、磬氏、矢人也。　又【集韻】子悉切，音唧。楖栗，木名。可爲杖。【范成大·丙午新正詩】病憐楖栗隨身慣。　又楖裴，縣名。【前漢·地理志】屬魏郡。一作卽。

楖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
楖字的起名意思

暂无。

Tuck
Basic explanation of words
Tuck
jí
[Mori] a. The tree mentioned in ancient books can be used as a walking stick; b. Borrowing a cane, such as "I'm used to it with me."
Tuck
zhì
Gu Tong "Zi".
Tuck
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" stop Seqie, enter Zhui, Zhuang. ]
Same as "栉1".
(1) The general term for combs.
(2) Combing hair.
(3) The work of controlling wood.
[②]［jí］
["Guangyun" is fully resourceful, qualitative, and refined. ]
See "Two chestnuts".
Tuck
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wooden Word Department] 　楖; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 539-16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Same with me.　[Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The fifth of scraping work: jade man, yu man, carving man, chong clan, ya man also.　[Jiyun] Zi Xiqie, sound chirp. Chestnut, wooden name. Can be a stick. [Fan Chengda·Bingwu New Poetry] I'm used to taking pity and pity.　Ye Pei, the name of the county. [Former Han Geography] belongs to Wei County. One for 卽.
